title: Look At Me
lyrics:
Look at me, I have been set free
All my sins are washed away
My nights turned to day, all because
Christ has set me free, free free (slow)
(Repeat)

Verse

You wonder how he can love me so

I'll never know, because

His precious love has given me security

Now I'm so happy, I'm happy



Look at me, I have been set free

All my sins are washed away

My nights turned to day, all because

Christ has set me free, free, free



Verse

You wonder how he can love me so

I'll never know, because

His precious love has given me security

Now I'm so happy, I'm happy



Look at me, I have been set free

All my sins are washed away

My nights turned to day, all because



Christ has set me free

Christ has set me free

Christ has set me free



Leader (adliv while others are singing "Christ has set me free)



He saved my soul

He made me whole

Free from pain

Free Free









(Thanks to Sarah Ray for these lyrics)
